11 Aug 2018

Mini G5 Hackintosh

3D Printed & Laser Cut Custom PC Case

Created a custom case for my hackintosh, it resembles a minified Power Mac G5. I have uploaded the parts to Thingiverse in case you’d like to make one of your own. The case is easy to print on a 300x300 printer, flat parts can be printed or laser cut to save time. Everything slides together smoothly, bondo and primer were used to smooth the printed parts.

Mac Build

  • Intel Core i7 6700K
  • GIGABYTE GA-Z170N-WIFI
  • 16GB DDR4 RAM
  • ARCTIC Freezer Heatsink
  • Slimline Power Supply
